pages.title: Gears
pages.text: A small wheel with teeth, gears interlocked with one another can turn to achieve any number of things.$(p)As such, they will have great use in constructing useful $(thing)machines$().

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: While the recipe shown is clearly for an $(item)Iron Gear$(), simply substituting the $(item)Iron Ingots$() with any other $(thing)Ingots() will create a gear of that type.
